bestPractices: Use semantic variants for headings and body; avoid styling raw text manually.
Keep line length readable and use theme scale for sizes and weights.
Donâ€™t rely on bold/colour alone to convey meaning; use structure and labels.
Respect language/locale when formatting numbers, dates, and direction.
Truncate thoughtfully; prefer wrapping or responsive layout for important content.
Use presets/tokens for consistency across pages and components.
